description: My place is close to Shake Shack, E and 4,5, 6 Trains, many many restaurants... Insomnia Cookie. You’ll love my place because of of it's old school NYC style, surrounded by lot's of restaurants, bars and 20 min walk from Central Park.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: One Bedroom in Midtown East Manhattan
review: Krystal was super accommodating and let us check in at 8am when our flight got in.  She showed us the place and gave us the keys.  It was nice she was still in New York for her to make another key when the key got jammed in a wrong lock.  She replied quickly and told us specifics and what to expect before arrival and what to do after.  The location was good with restaurants, cleaners, and shops on the block.  It was a nice pretty spacious place close to the subway and within walking distance to the city.  The apartment was also super warm in the winter didn't even need the heat.
